metadata.title: CVE-2019-17350 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.12.x allowing Arm domU attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) involving a compare-and-exchange operation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17350` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxendevicemodel1 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenevtchn1 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenforeignmemory1 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxengnttab1 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenhypfs1 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenmisc4.16 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenstore4 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxentoolcore1 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxentoollog1 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.16-amd64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.16-arm64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.16-armhf - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-common - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-system-amd64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-system-arm64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-system-armhf - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-utils-4.16 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-utils-common - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xenstore-utils - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> hypervisor packages are in universe. For issues in the hypervisor, add appropriate tags to each section, ex: Tags_xen: universe-binary

criterions.comment: xen package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1').
